name: Acoustic Guitar
description: A playable acoustic guitar used to attract ARC's attention, and impress other Raiders.

name: Adrenaline Shot
description: A serum that fully restores stamina and temporarily increases stamina regeneration.

name: Advanced ARC Powercell
description: Very valuable resource that drops from certain ARC enemies.

name: Advanced Electrical Components
description: Used to craft a wide range of items. Can be recycled into crafting materials. Used to craft: Tactical Mk. 3 (Defensive), Combat Mk. 3 (Flanking), Combat Mk. 3 (Aggressive), Looting Mk. 3 (Cautious), Tactical Mk. 3 (Healing)

name: Advanced Mechanical Components
description: Used to craft advanced weapons. Can be recycled into crafting materials. Used to craft: Torrente, Venator, Osprey, Renegade, Bettina

name: Agave
description: A piece of an agave leaf. Can be used to regain a small amount of health.

name: Air Freshener
description: May be worth a few coins.

name: Alarm Clock
description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

name: Alien Duck
description: A long, long way from home. Can be thrown to create noise.

name: Ancient Fort Security Code
description: One of four security codes needed to unlock the Locked Gate on Blue Gate. Found at Ancient Fort.

name: Angled Grip I
description: Slightly reduces horizontal recoil. Compatible with: Tempest, Arpeggio, Kettle, Ferro, Hullcracker

name: Angled Grip II
description: Moderately reduces horizontal recoil. Compatible with: Arpeggio, Ferro, Il Toro, Stitcher

description: Moderately reduces horizontal recoil. Compatible with: Arpeggio, Ferro, Il Toro, Stitcher

description: Significantly reduces horizontal recoil. Compatible with: Arpeggio, Ferro, Venator, Il Toro, Stitcher

name: Angled Grip III Blueprint
description: Significantly reduces horizontal recoil. Compatible with: Arpeggio, Ferro, Venator, Il Toro, Stitcher

name: Antiseptic
description: Used to craft medical supplies. Can be recycled into chemicals. Used to craft: Sterilized Bandage, Vita Spray, Vita Shot

name: Anvil Blueprint
description: Has high damage output and headshot damage, but slow handling.

description: Single-action hand cannon with high damage and headshot damage, but slow handling.

description: Single-action hand cannon with high damage and headshot damage, but slow handling.

description: Single-action hand cannon with high damage and headshot damage, but slow handling.

description: Single-action hand cannon with high damage and headshot damage, but slow handling.

description: Tech mod for the Anvil that replaces its bullets with ones that split into 4 weaker projectiles.

name: Aphelion
description: An experimental ARC beam weapon powered by a Matriarch Reactor.

name: Aphelion Blueprint
description: An experimental ARC beam weapon powered by a Matriarch Reactor.

name: Apricot
description: A sun ripe apricot. Can be consumed for a small amount of stamina.

description: Obtained from ARC enemies or activities. Used to craft components. Can be recycled into ARC Alloy. Used to craft: Medium Shield, Power Rod

description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

name: ARC Thermo Lining
description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

description: Has decent damage output and accuracy.

description: Has decent damage output and accuracy.

description: Has decent damage output and accuracy.

description: A deployable cover that can block incoming damage until it breaks.

name: Bastion Cell
description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

description: Has slow fire rate and high damage output.

description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

description: A grenade that detonates on impact, covering an area in fire that deals damage over time.

name: Blaze Grenade Trap

description: Something tells you that you don't want to open this... Can (reluctantly) be consumed to restore small amounts of stamina.

description: Unlocks a door by the Communication Tower near the Blue Gate

description: A throwable chemical light that illuminates the area around it.

description: Unlocks the door to the Town Hall in Buried City

name: Burletta I
description: Semi-automatic pistol with decent damage output and accuracy. Can be fired as fast as you can pull the trigger.

description: Semi-automatic pistol with decent damage output and accuracy. Can be fired as fast as you can pull the trigger.

name: Burned Arc Circuitry
description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

name: Burnt-Out Candles
description: After the grid fell candles became the preferred source of light for many. Unlike electricity, a good old candle will never fail you. Unless it's windy. Or raining. Or...

name: Camera Lens
description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

name: Candle Holder
description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

name: Candleberries
description: A waxy berry that grows only during a small window each year. People have depended on them to make candles, foods and medicine for ages.

name: Canister
description: Used to craft a wide range of items. Can be recycled into plastic. Used to craft: Bettina, Vita Spray, Heavy Fuze Grenade, Smoke Grenade

name: Cans Backpack Attachment
description: Cosmetic Backpack Attachment

name: Cat Bed
description: At least a tiny bit more comfortable than your face.

name: Celeste's Journal
description: Battered and torn, you can see the faint outline of doodles along the edges.

name: Cheer
description: A new cosmetic will be added to your collection.

name: Chemicals
description: Used to craft medical supplies, explosives, and utility items. Used to craft: Heavy Ammo, Medium Ammo, Shotgun Ammo, Light Ammo, Light Impact Grenade

name: Coffee Pot
description: The power to face a new day, one cup at a time.

name: Combat Mk. 1
description: Basic combat augment. Supports stronger shields, but with limited backpack capacity and Quick Use slots.

name: Combat Mk. 2
description: A Combat augment more focused on maneuverability than absorbing damage.
effects.Restores.value: 1 health every 5 seconds. When damage is taken, the effect is paused for 30 seconds.

name: Combat Mk. 3 (Aggressive)
description: An improved version of the Combat II augment. Supports more shield types, and comes with extra space for grenades.
effects.Health Regeneration.value: Restores 2 health every 5 seconds. When damage is taken the effect is paused for 30 seconds.

name: Combat Mk. 3 (Aggressive) Blueprint
description: An improved version of the Combat II augment. Supports more shield types, and comes with extra space for grenades.

name: Combat Mk. 3 (Flanking)
description: An improved version of the Combat II augment. Designed for flanking maneuvers with enhanced mobility.
effects.Health Regeneration.value: Restores 2 health every 5 seconds. When damage is taken the effect is paused for 30 seconds.

name: Combat Mk. 3 (Flanking) Blueprint
description: An improved version of the Combat II augment. Designed for flanking maneuvers with enhanced mobility.

description: Slightly reduces per-shot dispersion. Compatible with: Arpeggio, Ferro, Renegade, Anvil, Stitcher

name: Dart Board

name: Deadline
description: A mine that deals damage to anything within its radius once the timer runs out.

description: Unlocks the ability to craft Deadline mines at the explosives bench.

name: Defibrillator
description: An injection that quickly revives downed raiders and restores some health.

name: Defibrillator Blueprint
description: An injection that quickly revives downed raiders and restores some health.

name: Deflated Football
description: Just by looking at this, you too start to feel slightly deflated.

description: Obtained from ARC enemies or activities. Can be recycled into rubber.

name: Diving Goggles
description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

name: Dog Collar
description: After all this time, you can still smell the goodness.

name: Doodly Duck
description: Everything is a canvas to a creative child. Can be thrown to create noise.

name: Door Blocker
description: A locking mechanism that can be placed on large metal doors to limit access.

name: Dried-Out ARC Resin
description: Obtained from ARC enemies or activities. Can be recycled into plastic.

name: Duct Tape
description: Used to craft a wide range of items. Can be recycled into crafting materials. Used to craft: Stable Stock I, Vertical Grip I, Angled Grip I, Vertical Grip II, Angled Grip II

name: Durable Cloth
description: Used to craft medical supplies. Used to craft: Herbal Bandage, Sterilized Bandage

name: Electrical Components
description: Used to craft a wide range of items. Can be recycled into crafting materials. Used to craft: Tactical Mk. 2, Combat Mk. 2, Looting Mk. 2, Surge Shield Recharger, Lure Grenade

name: Empty Wine Bottle
description: Yes, it really is empty.

name: Energy Clip
description: Compatible with: Equalizer, Jupiter

name: Equalizer

description: A high capacity experimental beam rifle.

description: Used to craft a wide range of items. Used to craft: Tempest, Vulcano, Hullcracker, Bobcat, Snap Hook

description: A cryogenically frozen research sample of an experimental crop.

description: Way pasta its prime. Can (reluctantly) be consumed to restore small amounts of health.

name: Expired Respirator
description: The filters are clogged with sand and noxious fumes. Long past its lifespan.

description: A proximity-triggered explosive device that detonates when enemies approach.

name: Extended Barrel Blueprint
description: Moderately increases bullet velocity. Compatible with: Tempest, Arpeggio, Ferro, Renegade, Anvil

description: Significantly extends the ammo capacity of compatible weapons that use light ammo.

description: A snapshot of the world before, faded by sunlight and time.

name: Familiar Duck
description: Unlike the real one, this one fits in your pack. Can be thrown to create noise.

name: Ferro I
description: Packs a punch, but must be reloaded between every shot.

description: Packs a punch, but must be reloaded between every shot.

description: Packs a punch, but must be reloaded between every shot.

description: May be worth a few coins.

description: Can be recycled into ARC Alloy. Can be thrown to create small fires.

description: A device that sparks and pops in a pleasant manner.

description: A remotely triggered arrangement of dazzling fireworks, sure to put on a show.

description: Unlocks the crafting blueprint for the Fireworks Box.

name: First Wave Compass
description: Dusty but functional, these helped chart a course when all seemed lost.

description: Often heated above discreet fires, these meager provisions are said to have fueled a resistance.

name: First Wave Tape
description: An old tape found inside a battered old camcorder.

name: Flame Spray
description: A classic makeshift weapon, sure to leave scorch marks.

description: Lovingly hand-painted by someone of great talentclearly. Any guesses who? Can be thrown to create noise.

description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

description: An item that has a chance to spawn after lightning strikes.

description: A bolt-action sniper rifle with exceptional damage output and accuracy, but slow handling.

description: Semi-automatic assault rifle. Quick and accurate, but has low bullet velocity and takes a long time reload.

description: Quick and accurate, but has low bullet velocity and takes a long time to reload.

description: Quick and accurate, but has low bullet velocity and takes a long time to reload.

name: Leaper Pulse Unit
description: Can be recycled into crafting materials. Can be thrown to create a violent singularity.

description: Can be consumed for a small amount of stamina.

description: Without light, life underground would be impossible.

description: Assorted spare parts used for pistols and SMGs.

name: Light Impact Grenade

description: Moderately improves ADS & draw speed. Compatible with: Arpeggio, Kettle, Ferro, Renegade, Hullcracker

name: Lightweight Stock Blueprint
description: Moderately improves ADS & draw speed.

name: Li'l Smoke Grenade
description: A grenade that pops a thick but small smoke cloud on impact, blocking visibility from ARC and other Raiders.

name: Looting Mk. 1
description: Basic looting augment. More backpack slots and weight capacity, but low defensive and tactical capability.

name: Looting Mk. 2
description: Significantly increases looting potential; adds slots for trinkets. Automatically throws off attached Ticks after 0.5s.

name: Looting Mk. 3 (Cautious)
description: A looting augment that swaps some carry capacity to increase survivability. Upon Shield break, automatically administers a weak Adrenaline Shot. Has a fixed cooldown.

name: Looting Mk. 3 (Safekeeper)
description: A looting augment that trades weight and utility for increased looting potential. A Safe Pocket that allows any items to be stored.

name: Looting Mk. 3 (Safekeeper) Blueprint
description: A looting augment that trades weight and utility for increased looting potential. A Safe Pocket that allows any items to be stored.

name: Looting Mk. 3 (Survivor)
description: A heavy-duty pack mule augment. Large weight capacity and large backpack space. While downed and stationary, health regenerates up to 75% of max downed health.

name: Looting Mk. 3 (Survivor) Blueprint
description: A heavy-duty pack mule augment. Large weight capacity and large backpack space.

name: Lure Grenade
description: A noise device that sticks to surfaces, distracting nearby ARC machines and drawing their fire.

name: Lure Grenade Blueprint
description: A noisy device that sticks to surfaces, distracting nearby ARC machines and drawing their fire.

name: Lure Grenade Trap
description: A laser trip wire that detonates a Lure Grenade.

name: Magnet

name: Tactical Mk. 1

name: Tactical Mk. 3 (Healing)
description: A healing-focused augment which adds extra slots for healing items. When revived from being downed, releases a healing cloud that restores 20 health over 10 seconds. Has a 30-second cooldown.

name: Tactical Mk. 3 (Healing) Blueprint
description: A healing-focused augment which adds extra slots for healing items.

name: Tactical Mk. 3 (Revival)
description: A revival-focused augment designed for team support. Restores 1 health every 5 seconds. When damage is taken, the effect is paused for 30 seconds. Includes an integrated Defibrillator with infinite uses and a 240-second cooldown.

name: Tactical Mk. 3 (Revival) Blueprint
description: A revival-focused augment designed for team support. Restores 1 health every 5 seconds. When damage is taken, the effect is paused for 30 seconds. Includes an integrated Defibrillator with infinite uses and a 240-second cooldown.
